text:
@matthewamiller Umm, maybe it's good that someone in the @WhiteHouse is acknowledging that, you know, #COVID19 is still a WORLDWIDE PANDEMIC.

(Ducking) - sorry, didn't realize I was yelling at the end. https://t.co/rCrUfEyvjy
